summary: This is a monthly asbestos abatement report form from the Federal Bureau of Prisons (FBOP), dated July 7, 2019. It is a procedural document outlining reporting requirements for asbestos removal activities, including necessary documentation and submission protocols to the Department of Justice (DOJ). The document itself is a template, not a completed report of a specific event.
keyFacts: The document is a Federal Bureau of Prisons (FBOP) form for reporting monthly asbestos abatement activities.
It requires reporting of all costs, quantities, and types of asbestos abatement to ensure proper reporting to the Department of Justice (DOJ).
The form template was created on July 7, 2019, and was last updated on August 31, 2017.
The document is procedural and does not contain information about specific individuals, events, or completed asbestos abatement work related to the Epstein case.
